code: import React from'react';import $ from'jquery';import'../libs/easing.js';class BackToTop extends React.Component{componentDidMount(){$('.back-to-top').click(function(){$('html, body').animate({scrollTop:0},1500,'easeInOutExpo');return false;});window.addEventListener('scroll',()=>{if(window.pageYOffset>100){document.querySelector('.back-to-top').classList.remove("fadeOut");document.querySelector('.back-to-top').style.display="block";document.querySelector('.back-to-top').classList.add("fadeIn");}else{document.querySelector('.back-to-top').classList.remove("fadeIn");document.querySelector('.back-to-top').classList.add("fadeOut");}});}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("a",{href:"#",className:"back-to-top animated"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:"fa fa-chevron-up"}));}}export default BackToTop;
